description: An agent specialized in providing user reports and incident information. It can retrieve citizen reports, emergency situations, infrastructure issues, and maintenance requests from across the city.
name: user_report_agent

skills.name: User Reports and Incidents
skills.description: Retrieve information about user reports, incidents, emergencies, and maintenance issues reported by citizens

skills.name: Detailed Report Information
skills.description: Get detailed information about specific reports using document IDs
